quest.name: Hare-raising Thrills
journal:
An unusual request from Thrillingway has left Managingway utterly baffled.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested item to the trembling Loporrit.
objectives: Synthesize [Error]Deliver [Error] to the trembling Loporrit.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Tell me, have you heard of a fellow by the name of Thrillingway? An eccentric one, he is─he believes it is the sublime rush of a thrill that colors the blandness of life with meaning. I cannot say I agree, but nevertheless, he seeks our help with fulfilling his dream.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: He desires an instrument of some kind to help him discover new thrills. Unfortunately, our very best minds have been unable to grasp what precisely it is that he wishes for.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Do you remember Thrillingway? He's come to us again, seeking a new instrument for thrills. My fellows have tried everything, but have again been unable to come up with anything that would please him.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: As a person who has seen thrills of all sorts, I believe you are the only one who can understand him. You're our last hope, in any case.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Keepingway yonder has various materials at paw to craft what is needed. If anyone can do this, it's you.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Here to assist with the matter concerning Thrillingway, yes? Your help is much appreciated! I should have everything you need right here, but I'm afraid the exact process of the desired item's construction is beyond my understanding...

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: It seems he requires a pair of shears─but not just any pair. No, he desires blades sharp enough to carve fur clean off! <shudder> See what you can do with these pointy pieces of metal.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: He wants a sturdy coil of rope suitable for binding all four limbs of...a “friend,” allegedly. I would prefer not to know any further details, so if you could just see what you can do with this sack of materials here...

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Seems he wants a highly acidic gel for some dubious purpose I did not have the heart to inquire about. Honestly, I think it's best if we don't know. So, uh, see what you can do with these toxic substances...

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: When you've finished, please deliver the item to a certain terrified Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale. Just look for a fellow trembling with fear, you can't miss 'em. They'll take over the delivery from there.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Given the unique and trying nature of the request, you may find yourself in need of additional materials. Should that be the case, simply approach the doing supporter yonder for replenishments.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04699
dialogue.text: <beep> A request for materials? For this supporter? Aww, you shouldn't have! <bloop> Oh, wait, you really shouldn't have...you already possess a sufficient amount.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04699
dialogue.text: <beep> A request for materials? For this supporter? Aww, you shouldn't have! <bloop> Oh, wait, you really shouldn't have...you already possess a sufficient amount.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04699
dialogue.text: <beep> A request for materials? For this supporter? Aww, you shouldn't have! <bloop> Oh, wait, you really shouldn't have...you already possess a sufficient amount.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04699
dialogue.text: Hello there! Need materials, do you? Well it's your lucky day, because it so happens this supporter has plenty of them available! <beep> Clarification: Replenishing depleted materials is this supporter's programmed function. Luck is not an included parameter.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04699
dialogue.text: Hello there! Need materials, do you? Well it's your lucky day, because it so happens this supporter has plenty of them available! <beep> Clarification: Replenishing depleted materials is this supporter's programmed function. Luck is not an included parameter.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04699
dialogue.text: Hello there! Need materials, do you? Well it's your lucky day, because it so happens this supporter has plenty of them available! <beep> Clarification: Replenishing depleted materials is this supporter's programmed function. Luck is not an included parameter.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04699
dialogue.text: D-D-Did you bring the item Th-Thrillingway requested? Oh sweet Mother Hydaelyn, I'm too afraid to look... <whimper>

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04699
dialogue.text: Oh dear, y-you actually made it. But is it safe to deliver it to him? The th-things he'll do... <shiver>

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04699
dialogue.text: Oh, bugger. I m-must respect the effort you went through to fulfill his dream. I will deliver it to him as requested. P-Please let Managingway know, and maybe, just maybe...consider sending help.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: You're returned! For you to have completed so unusual a request with such aplomb, you truly were the right person for the job.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Thrillingway appears to be quite pleased with the item, but I must say his behavior has grown increasingly erratic. I suppose it will be fine as long as he's happy, and no one gets hurt... No one has been hurt, right?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
